title: October 23, 2019: Maker (MKR): Down 1.73%; Price Crosses 20 Day Average; 3rd Consecutive Down Day
text:
How Did Maker’s Price Fare Yesterday?

Maker’s current price, at the time of this writing, is $476.68 USD, down by approximately 1.73% from the day prior. This marked the the 3rd straight day Maker has been down; it is still in a unclear trend, and is currently 1.36% below its 20 day moving average; staying above this level may be critical to sustain short-term momentum. Maker’s expected trading range — as forecasted by the Bollinger bands indicator, which determines a range based on momentum and volatility over the past two weeks — is between $454.0092 and $512.4838. Given its boundaries, rangebound traders may find it compelling to entertain buying, as we are nearer to the bottom of the range.

Trade Maker (MKR) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

The currency’s market cap currently stands at $497 million US dollars.

Daily Engagement Metrics Update

860 transactions amongst holders of Maker occurred yesterday. Regarding a tally of holders, Yesterday saw Maker’s wallet count jump by 20. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has Maker ranked 11 out of the 35 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

Observing Maker’s Richest Wallets

Of the coin’s total money supply, the richest 1,0000 wallets currently own 98.38%. Drilling down to just exchanges, the top 1,000 wallets that are exchanges control 0.95% of the currency’s money supply. The week over week growth rate in the share of the total supply of the top 1,000 wallets has changed by -0.03%; as for the share of the total supply owned by exchange wallets within the top 1,000 wallets, that has changed by -0.03%. The underlying smart contract itself for Maker owns 0.08% of the total money supply; over the past week, this amount has not changed.

Technical Development Status

Maker hasn’t had any activity on any of its GitHub repos since October 22, 2019 — 1 days prior. Over the past 30 days, we’ve seen open issues across Maker’s GitHub repositories grow by -0.2 per day on average, while the number of watchers has grown by 0.2.

The Latest on Maker and Social Media

In terms of social media presence, Maker saw its Twitter followers and Reddit subscribers go up by 74 and 18 over the past 24 hours. Twitter appears to be the most popular place to follow the company, and thus may be worth monitoring. Use this link to follow Maker on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Maker, listed under the symbol MKR, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
